analyzed: dhamma paccanīya anuloma tika tika paṭṭhāna pāḷi
sa ni dassana ttika uppanna ttika

original: Nasanidassanasappaṭigho nauppanno dhammo anidassanaappaṭighassa uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
analyzed: na sa nidassana sappaṭighaḥ na uppannaḥ dhammaḥ anidassana appaṭighassa uppannassa dhammassa ārammaṇa paccayena paccayaḥ saṅkhitta
